question: 旋風
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>rotation</kanji> of <kanji>wind</kanji> forms a <vocabulary>whirlwind</vocabulary>, in both the physical and figurative senses. On the figurative side, it can also mean <vocabulary>commotion</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>sensation</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out because <ja>ふう</ja> becomes <ja>ぷう</ja> here (hehe).
